TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1333
TEI.2.document_title: Bartlett Sims to Stephen F. Austin, 05-14-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Bartlett Sims to Austin, May 14, 1826. Report of a scouting expedition after Indians.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1333

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Bartlett Sims to Austin, May 14, 1826. Report of a scouting expedition after Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Coln *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir Agreeable to your order I Dispatchd two men *person_mentioned*Washing Curtis*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Robert Arm Strong*/person_mentioned* to Examin the *location_mentioned*countray west of this Place*/location_mentioned* they went out a Bout 35 miles *location_mentioned*a Bout 10 miles west*/location_mentioned* thay came to *location_mentioned*foot trail*/location_mentioned* Cold not asertain How many and then *location_mentioned*10 miles west of Curtese*/location_mentioned* they came to a *location_mentioned*foot trail*/location_mentioned* of 15 or 20 *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*8 miles west of Curtises*/location_mentioned* thay came to a trail 15 or 20 Horses and But one Mule track a mong them to Be Discoverd Theas Horses was Rode By *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*as thay Traild them to whar thay Got Down and Drank all theas Trail was Traveling near a N :W Cours I Have just Receivd news of *person_mentioned*king Caid*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Furn Ashes*/person_mentioned* Horses all Being Stolen all this Sign appears To Be 2 or 3 Days oald */p* *p*I Hope you will Take Some affective measures*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Bartlett Sims*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Coln Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
